page.title: 06Woolley St. Peter's Church.
page.content: The vicar came to talk to us.We asked him a lot of questions.I asked him how much money they had spent on the repairs.He said they had spent 37,000 pounds.Then we asked Mr.Pearson "Has the church been knocked down?" The first church was made out of wood. A stone church was built later. I asked the vicar "When do you have services ?"He said that he has communion on Wednesday morning and evening services on Sundays. The next week we went to church and we listened to a communion service. I saw my next door neighbour. Then the vicar showed us round the church and the yard.We could not go up to the bell tower.It is very dangerous.My teacher works in the bell tower.She rings a bell.
